subject: DAVID CARL LEE
body:
DAVID CARL LEE
INSPECTION UNIT
J.F Kennedy International Airport New York
Dear Owner Verify,
I am David C. Lee, Chief Inspection Agent- United Nations Inspection Unit
at John F. Kennedy International airport, New York- working hand in hand
with the Department of Homeland Security and U.S Customs and Border Protection.
During our investigation, I discovered an abandoned shipment from a
Diplomat from London, UK and when scanned it revealed an undisclosed sum of
money in a metal trunk box weighing approximately 25kg each. The
consignment was abandoned because the Content was not properly declared by
the consignee as money rather it was declared as personal effect to avoid
diversion by the shipping agent and also the Diplomat inability to pay for
Non Inspection Fees.
On my assumption, each of the boxes will contain about $3Million to
$4Million each and the consignment is still left in the storage house till
today. The consignment are two metal boxes with weight of about 25kg each
(Internal dimension: W61 x H156 x D73 (cm). Effective capacity: 110 LBS.).
Approximately, the details of the consignment including your name and
address, and the official document from the United Nation office in London are
tagged on the Metal Trunk boxes.
PROVIDE YOUR NAME:
FULL HOME ADDRESS:
PHONE NUMBER:
IDENTITY CARD
:
TO CROSS CHECK IF IT CORRESPONDS WITH THE NAME AND ADDRESS ON THE
CONSIGNMENT INCLUDING THE NAME OF NEAREST AIRPORT AROUND YOUR
CITY AND OTHER DETAILS.
You can send the required details to me by email for onward delivery. All
communication must be held extremely confidential. I can get everything
concluded within 5-6 hours upon your acceptance and proceed to your address
for delivery if you assure me of sharing the content 30% for me / 70% for
you on my arrival to your house.
I want us to transact this business with you and share the money, since the
shipper has abandoned it and disappeared. I will pay for the Non inspection
fee and arrange for the boxes to be moved out of this airport to your
address by myself. But I will share it 30%/70% with you. Make sure Respond
to me.
 as soon as you receive this
mail and send me all the requested information to my email.
DAVID CARL LEE
INSPECTION UNIT

subject: Re: DAVID CARL LEE
body:
Hello David Carl Lee,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing! It's not every day that one hears about abandoned shipments at the airport, especially ones containing such a large sum of money.

I'm curious though, how did my name and address end up on these metal trunk boxes? And why was the shipment abandoned in the first place? 

Also, could you please explain more about this Non Inspection Fee? How much is it and why does it need to be paid?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Aaron

subject: Re: DAVID CARL LEE
body:
Thank you for your email response Mr. Mark, Firstly you don't have to be
curious about the whole thing because i am 100% sure about this transaction
and it's risk free, your name and address is tagged on the trunk boxes
including your email because i decided to get in contact with you because
this corrupt officials are doing all they can to confiscate your fund so
they can have full access to your funds in other to share it among
themselves.

The consignment boxes were being abandoned by the diplomat man who was
supposed to deliver it to your doorstep because he wasn't able to pay for
the inspection fee of $4,475, in my previous email to you, i stated that i
will be paying for the non inspection fee of $4,475 all by myself but
first, you have to reconfirm your personal details and also inform me if
you are okay with the percentage sharing in which you will be getting 70%
of the total funds while i will have 30%.

You can always call me on this phone (646) 397-2193. Please all our
communication on phone should be brief because I don't want any of my
colleagues to suspect me as you know that I am still in active service.
Though, I know that we are not supposed to do this as Iâ€™m supposed to
declare the content of the boxes and but the authorities here will
confiscate the consignment or return it to UN office in UK but due to my
financial situation now I have no other option than to do it to save my
future and the future of my family. Please kindly provide the necessary
details for verification before we can forge ahead.

PROVIDE YOUR NAME:
FULL HOME ADDRESS:
PHONE NUMBER:
IDENTITY CARD:
Also tell me your nearest international airport where i can come, also view
the attached file to view my working ID to know that i am being real and
legitimate.

You have to guarantee my Share to me, I will finalize every arrangement
before 10:00AM (EDT) tomorrow and I will board a flight and proceed to meet
you with the boxes. Please, I don't want to deal with any other person or
party in this transaction because I have to protect my legitimate service
with the United Nations. As soon as I conclude all arrangements, I will
send my flight schedule and a copy of my passport to you for facial
identification upon my arrival at your airport.

Expecting to hear from you.

David Carl. Lee
INSPECTION UNIT
(646) 397-2193

subject: Re: DAVID CARL LEE
body:
Hello David Carl Lee,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting situation you've described, and I must admit, it's a bit overwhelming to take in all at once. 

I'm curious about the trunk boxes you mentioned. How did my name and address get tagged on them? And why was the diplomat unable to pay for the inspection fee? 

You also mentioned a percentage sharing of funds. Could you please elaborate more on this? What exactly is the total amount of these funds?

As for my personal details, I hope you understand that I need to be cautious about sharing such information online. However, I can tell you that my nearest airport is John F. Kennedy International Airport.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Aaron
